channel.title: Java Heap Space
channel.description: I have a problem with my server when every once in a while I get an error outofmemory java heap space or whatever. I know you can fix this but I dont know how, can someone help me or link me a tut on how to do it?

I have a problem with my server when every once in a while I get an error outofmemory java heap space or whatever. I know you can fix this but I dont know how, can someone help me or link me a tut on how to do it?
